name: returned null String compared to nullable String variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyStr: String; return nullStr == emptyStr;

name: returned null Number compared to nullable Number variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullNum: Number = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyNum: Number; return nullNum == emptyNum;

name: returned null Boolean compared to nullable Boolean variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullBool: Boolean = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyBool: Boolean; return nullBool == emptyBool;

name: returned null NumberWithUnit compared to nullable NumberWithUnit variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullUnit: NumberWithUnit = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyUnit: NumberWithUnit; return nullUnit == emptyUnit;

name: returned null Color compared to nullable Color variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullColor: Color = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyColor: Color; return nullColor == emptyColor;

name: returned null Color.Hex compared to nullable Color.Hex variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullHex: Color.Hex = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyHex: Color.Hex; return nullHex == emptyHex;

name: returned null String not equal to nullable String variable
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyStr: String; return nullStr != emptyStr;

name: returned null String compared to String with value
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable valueStr: String = "hello"; return nullStr == valueStr;

name: returned null Number compared to Number with value
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullNum: Number = dict.get("foo"); variable valueNum: Number = 42; return nullNum == valueNum;

name: returned null Boolean compared to Boolean with value
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullBool: Boolean = dict.get("foo"); variable valueBool: Boolean = true; return nullBool == valueBool;

name: returned null NumberWithUnit compared to NumberWithUnit with value
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullUnit: NumberWithUnit = dict.get("foo"); variable valueUnit: NumberWithUnit = 10px; return nullUnit == valueUnit;

name: returned null Color compared to Color with value
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullColor: Color = dict.get("foo"); variable valueColor: Color = #ff0000; return nullColor == valueColor;

name: multiple returned null values compared
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr1: String = dict.get("foo"); variable nullStr2: String = dict.get("bar"); return nullStr1 == nullStr2;

name: returned null in complex comparison expression
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyStr: String; variable valueStr: String = "test"; return (nullStr == emptyStr) && (nullStr != valueStr);

name: returned null in if statement condition - true branch
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable emptyStr: String; if (nullStr == emptyStr) [ return "both null"; ] else [ return "not equal"; ];

name: returned null in if statement condition - false branch
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable valueStr: String = "hello"; if (nullStr == valueStr) [ return "equal"; ] else [ return "not equal"; ];

name: cross-type null comparison should work with nullable types
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable nullStr: String = dict.get("foo"); variable nullNum: Number = dict.get("bar"); return nullStr == null && nullNum == null;

name: returned null from different dictionary methods should be equal
input: variable dict1: Dictionary; variable dict2: Dictionary; variable null1: String = dict1.get("missing1"); variable null2: String = dict2.get("missing2"); return null1 == null2;

name: chained dictionary method calls with null comparison
input: variable dict: Dictionary; variable result: String = dict.get("nonexistent1"); variable result2: String = dict.get("nonexistent2"); return result == result2 && result == null;
